parser

Class Symbol

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.Symbol

  • public class Symbol
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent a symbol of the grammar. A symbol is represented by a character (char) and an interpretation (int). This interpretation can be one of the static values of this class, or a personalized one. If you use personalized interpretation, please make sure the int is strictly greater than 10. an intepretation of 0 is invalid.
    Author:
    xinouch
